title: Notification of phone messages
content:
I have a pixel 4 xl. I have tried to  get notifications for PHONE VOICWE messages that are left for me. Now I am checking messages daily. There is no notification that I have messages. I am not sure what needs to change. I have searched the internet and have tried numerous changes with no success. Why is the phone not giving me visual notifications of VOICE messages that are left for me. This is urgent as it has caused me to miss some important calls. Thank you for  your attention
Walter Munz
